document_data.mainbody:
ur-baagal was one of the primordials who fought against the gods before the Sundering of Abeir-Toril.
At the dawn of time, Dur-baagal opposed the gods and was killed by Auril.
The throne room of Aurils Winters Hall, the Lyceum, was crafted from the still beating heart of Dur-baagal.
